long_description: Free up space in your car with the Thule Force L roof box. It features an aerodynamic design with textured skin and plenty room to haul your gear to your favorite destination. Aerodynamic shape and the diamond-textured skin on lid of roof box helps to reduce drag. Tool-free QuickGrip(TM) mounting system comes pre-installed so you'll be on the road in seconds. QuickGrip system can be mounted on square and round crossbars and most factory racks (see Fit List); attaches with a single, 1-handed motion. Patented, dual-side openings let you access your gear from either side of the box. Locking system features an external lock-assist knob that is easy to use; built-in safety feature means the key can only be removed when the box is fully closed. User-friendly locking system includes an oversize key; a lock is located on each side of the box, and each lock comes with 2 keys. Thule Force L roof box holds 3 - 4 snowboards.
short_description: Free up space in your car with the Thule Force L roof box. It features an aerodynamic design with textured skin and plenty room to haul your gear to your favorite destination.
